pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, September 18, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, September 18, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Welcoming Ceremony for the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, Theresa May.

Peace Tower
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.

Prime Ministerâ€™s Office
Centre Block

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.

Foyer
Centre Block

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend an Invictus Games event with the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.

Lisgar Collegiate Institute
29 Lisgar Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 3:00 p.m.

5:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a working dinner with the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.

Closed to media
